definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need

sentences.english: If the ball arrives one second beforehand, will you yield it to the wind?
sentences.chinese: 如果球儿提早了一秒飞来，你是否听任它消逝在风中？

sentences.english: They would disappear in the marshland and the fog of war.
sentences.chinese: 他们将在战争的迷雾和泥潭中消逝无踪。

sentences.english: He'll never fade, like the daytime mirages.
sentences.chinese: 他决不会像白昼的海市蜃楼一样逐渐消逝。

sentences.english: Murmur , a little sadly, how love fled.
sentences.chinese: 凄然地低语那爱的消逝。

sentences.english: Such lost worlds are vanishingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 这样消逝的世界正在悄无声息地变得稀有起来。

sentences.english: Yesterday although dissipated, distinguishes to meet by chance difficultly, how can forget your affection.
sentences.chinese: 昨天虽已消逝，分别难相逢，怎能忘记你的一片深情。

sentences.english: I can't make an entire life disappear to start a new one.
sentences.chinese: 我不能让生命就此消逝无踪，重头再来。

sentences.english: Murmur, a little sadly, how loved fled.
An experimental setup is established to demonstrate evanescent wave of total internal reflection.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一套演示光全内反射产生的消逝波的实验装置。

sentences.english: With development crashing through the hutong, this is a restaurant to visit sooner rather than later.
sentences.chinese: 随着胡同的日益消逝，拜访这家店宜早不宜迟。

sentences.english: Youth is always so short, such as the wind died in September.
sentences.chinese: 青春总是这般短暂，如那年的风一般消逝在九月。

sentences.english: But when youth , the dream , departs .
sentences.chinese: 可是，梦幻般的青春一旦消逝。

sentences.english: What we see is the blossom, which passes. The rhizome remains.
sentences.chinese: 我们所见到的是将会消逝的花簇，而根茎长驻。

sentences.english: Here love had died between me and the army.
sentences.chinese: 我和军队间的爱，就这样消逝了。

sentences.english: My thoughts still cling to the moldering past.
sentences.chinese: 我的思绪依然纠缠着消逝的往事。

sentences.english: In a long, slow degradation of guilt and regret and blame.
sentences.chinese: 在漫长岁月中因内疚，后悔和自责而不断消逝。

definition: (of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
to bury/to submerge/to pass into oblivion/to obliterate/to annihilate (physics)
to change into/to turn into/to become
